non_delegation_notice: host.proof is a pseudo-TLD style label used for recognition and hosting references only. It is not part of the global DNS root, is not delegated by ICANN/IANA, and does not imply internet-wide uniqueness or naming authority.

bridge.name: host.proof/Cloud
bridge.semantics: Reference bridge only. Not DNS delegation, not a registry action, and not a claim of control over any external namespace.
